Timers

Classes

class  cPrecisionClock
 cPrecisionClock provides a class to manage high-precision time measurements. All measurements are computed in seconds unless otherwise-specified.
cPrecisionClock behaves just like a real chronograph: It can be started, stopped and restarted a later time. When the clock is running (ON), time is accumulated until the next stop event (OFF). The value of the clock can be read at any time by calling method getCurrentTimeSeconds(). When the clock is stopped (OFF), time is no longer accumulated. More...
